classification_data.text: EL SUSCRITO REVISOR FISCAL DE LA SOCIEDAD COTEL S.A.S NIT 800.122.811-2 CERTIFICA QUE: De acuerdo con el Acta No. 063 de la Asamblea General Ordinaria de Accionistas de Cotel S.A.S de fecha marzo 29 de 2022, la nueva composición accionaria quedó registrada así: Accionista | Documento Identificación | No. de Acciones | % de Participación James Herney Quijano Morán | 16.758.096 | 5.740.000.000 | 82% María del Pilar Zuluaga Marín | 66.901.361 | 700.000.000 | 10% Nicolle Dayana Quijano Zuluaga | 1.107.089.788 | 210.000.000 | 3% Juan Pablo Quijano Zuluaga | 1.144.109.912 | 210.000.000 | 3% Cotel S.A.S | 800.122.811-2 | 140.000.000 | 2% Total | | 7.000.000.000 | 100% La nueva composición accionaria fue registrada en los libros contables, así mismo fue actualizado el libro de Registro de Accionistas. La presente certificación se expide en Santiago de Cali a los cinco (05) días del mes de febrero de 2024. Gustavo Adolfo Luna Salazar Revisor Fiscal TP No. 77391-T Miembro de Bloodhound Consulting Group SAS www.cotel.com.co

content.thinking: Let me analyze this document step by step following the classification workflow: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** The document contains significant text in Spanish. I can extract the following: - "EL SUSCRITO REVISOR FISCAL DE LA SOCIEDAD COTEL S.A.S" - "NIT 800.122.811-2" - "CERTIFICA QUE:" - Information about shareholders ("Accionista"), documents, number of shares ("No. de Acciones"), and participation percentage ("% de Participación") - A table showing shareholding composition with names, ID numbers, shares, and percentages - "La nueva composición accionaria fue registrada en los libros contables" - Signed by "Gustavo Adolfo Luna Salazar, Revisor Fiscal" 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** - This is not BLANK - there's substantial content - This is not LINK_ONLY - no URLs or redirects, it's a complete document 3. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** What is the MAIN PURPOSE of this document? - This document is certifying the shareholding composition of a company (COTEL S.A.S) - It shows detailed information about shareholders, their identification numbers, number of shares, and percentage of participation - The document states "la nueva composición accionaria quedó registrada así" (the new shareholding composition was registered as follows) - It contains a table with shareholder names, identification documents, number of shares, and participation percentages - This indicates ACC (shareholding composition document) 4. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** - The document is issued by "EL SUSCRITO REVISOR FISCAL DE LA SOCIEDAD COTEL S.A.S" (The undersigned fiscal auditor of COTEL S.A.S company) - It's signed by "Gustavo Adolfo Luna Salazar, Revisor Fiscal" - This is issued by a corporate entity (the company itself through its fiscal auditor), which is indicative of ACC I verify the document's classification by systematically ruling out other potential categories. The shareholding composition is clearly documented, confirming its ACC status with precise shareholder details and official certification by the fiscal auditor.
